title: Seamless Edge TTS Tool
excerpt: Streamed Microsoft Edge TTS - Low-Latency, Affordable, and Easy-to-Use Text-to-Speech Solution
content:
## Seamless Edge TTS Tool.

You only need one web address to use this tool. It's very simple to use.

## Notes
The duration of the response time may be affected by the length of the text parameter.

> For some developers who are inquiring about the character limit for input, my response is that I have tested the POST method with 10,000 characters. It still functioned correctly, although it took significantly longer to process.

## Screenshots

![en-US](https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/920db9a6b021a344818c7.png)
![zh-CN](https://im.gurl.eu.org/file/7cad96e3cded757cf6625.png)

## Reqest Parameters in GET & POST(JSON in body) request.
1. `text`: The words you want the voice to say
2. `voice` :  The kind of voice you want

**Response:** Downloadable MP3 file. It also can be played within any players including web browser.

You can find  values of `voice` in the table below:
